QuestData.Title: Ceremonial Drums
QuestData.Description:
Those foolish calves!
They've made off with our ceremonial drums again, treating them as toys... as... common drums!
Can you help me find them? They must be scattered to all corners of Thunder Totem by now, discarded as soon as the fun dries up.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find $1oa Large, $2oa Medium, and $3oa Small Ceremonial Drums in Thunder Totem.
QuestData.RewardText: Nice! Got 'em! Feel free to play the drums, but leave them down here, will you? You're alright by me, $n.
